segments.text: I catch a glimpse of the girl, her hand raised in expectation, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something innocent about her eagerness, but it’s paired with a hint of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t noticed the chaos unfolding just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of the tidy garden outside against the burgeoning mess inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a ticking time bomb, with the stool teetering and the water pooling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I am here, just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a thrill in their clandestine act, but it makes me uneasy at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
